website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for families or friends who don’t share the same taste in beer.
pros: Dual faucets give you the option to pour two types of brews at the same time
Owners rave that Deep Chill function cools warm beer fast
cons: Not designed for temperatures colder than 65°F or warmer than 80°F

customer_reviews.title: Average overall value - should be better for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: The good: instructions are easy to follow. Unit arrived undamaged. Nice drip tray The Bad: the components are all made in China. The draft beer faucet and lever are poorly made. The faucets included for this $1000 model are NOT stainless steel and frequently freeze up after a few pulls of beer. I almost broke the shank trying to get the rap to open. My temperature is set at 38 degrees and if the lines are close to the back of the unit, they freeze, no beer. Even at 38 degrees. Buy good real stainless steel faucets from another vendor. Check your lines and keep them off the back inside part of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Bobeck

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: We love our kegerator and have taken it to parties with great success. This is my second kegerator and I love this one more. It starts cold at 32 degrees and beer is perfect temperature. I use two kegs and one 1/2 just depends on the mood or party. We entertain a lot so this a must have.
customer_reviews.author: William M

customer_reviews.title: ... was broken and inside of the refrigerator was vey dirty I think they should do a better job to ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item today when I open up all the parts inside was losing the cover for the thermostat was broken and inside of the refrigerator was vey dirty I think they should do a better job to hold all the parts in place for transportation
customer_reviews.author: Paula Bellini

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent but just keep in mind that it may come with damage!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ups damaged it on the bottom right rear corner, the frame was bent luckily it still works I had to call amazon and complain I was able to get a 40% discount because UPS sucks and damaged it. This item only came an hour away from me they should have called me to let me know and I would have went there and picked it up. Other than that it works fine the noise is just like your refrigerator. easy to assemble even though it came with no instructions at all and I got some bolts, nuts and washers left over. Money well spent but just keep in mind that it may come with damage
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but expect to put more money to get beer out and not just foam
customer_reviews.text: Despite getting extras like flow control spouts and a tower cooler fan, this thing spits out foam like crazy. Not just the first pour either, they're all about 50/50 with Psi set at 10. After some research it seems like the tubing needs to be upgraded to 10ft instead of the 5 included. Cider flows okay at higher psi. Cool novelty but having beer go flat because 50% of the c02 is escaping the beer as foam just doesn't make putting a keg down easy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works great but arrived with damage
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a damaged interior door. Too heavy and large to return so we contacted mfg regarding just replacing door. That was early January and we are still waiting for them to get back to us after initial contact. Too much money to arrive with damage. Hoping they will do what’s right since was due to packing interior that caused damage and not UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Suze C.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable. Great value. Use it to ferment!
customer_reviews.text: I've run this unit daily for the past 2 years or so. Not a single issue. People having bad experiences must have just stuck with a lemon. Along with its reliability, my favorite thing aboutbit is that it can be dialed up and used as a fermentation chamber. Highly recommend! Would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works great- better if they didn’t ship Fedex
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far- arrived with damage to side which is the only reason for 3 stars. Purely aesthetic, but still disappointing. That’s the carrier’s fault. Wish they didn’t use Fedex- we seem to always have issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: DavisMom111213

customer_reviews.title: "Picked the wrong week to quit drinking"
customer_reviews.text: Never owned a kegerator before, decided to look into with for graduation and upcoming home events. It has passed the first month without any issue works great. I needed help from a more experienced person. But once I received the education, the product was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Eddieman

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Great kegerator. The faucets could be better - the ones included stick too much. I upgraded to Perlick faucets and they're great. Kegerator easily fits 3 slim kegs, I currently have a tall 1/4 Keg (from Corona) and a slim 1/6 keg from Sam Adams and still have room for some random 6-packs. Overall, very happy with this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!!
customer_reviews.text: I read so many intimidating reviews about psi this and temp that, that I was almost scared to jump in. But I did. I’m glad I did! Should have done it years ago. Did some research and this was the best one IMO. It came early. Set it up and tapped a couple kegs. Blue Moon and Infusion Vanilla bean Ale. Blue moon was suppose to be a tricky one. This thing poured perfect after the first pour. My temp control is spot on. I know what these beers are suppose to taste like and they are spot on! Love this kegerator.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Came all beat up
customer_reviews.text: The inside door came all scratched and the back left and right corner came all dented up. Not worth the $900 plus dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Zero issues, only took a few pours to dial it in. Quality hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Cold beer
customer_reviews.text: Great kegerator and wonderful seller as well. This unit maintains consistant temperature and runs quiet. The inly upgrade I would recommend is perkick faucets
customer_reviews.author: J. Duecker

customer_reviews.title: Washers maybe missing but problem fixed
customer_reviews.text: The taps may leak but with the great help of the Amazon rep she called the manufacturer and they were aware of some taps being sent with out washers in the tower between the tap and tower. Manufacturer sending them right out! Love Amazon and their customer service
customer_reviews.author: Tedra S.

customer_reviews.title: Great kegarator!
customer_reviews.text: So many good things to say about this unit & overall transaction. The unit runs so quiet you can even tell that it's plugged in it also keeps its contents nice and cold Throw in the prime shipping and I'm not sure what else you could ask for. The tower is insulated unlike many kegarators on the market so the beer in the lines is also nice and cold. Digital read out of the temp and external controls are also a nice upgrade from my old kegarator.
customer_reviews.author: AAK

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this kegerator
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this kegerator. Been using it for several months now with no issues whatsoever. Easily fits 3 corny kegs (serves 2). Tap hardware is not "top of the line" but not poor quality, either. Noise is not an issue. Can hear it when the compressor kicks on periodically, but only if I'm in the room (kitchen). Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GregA

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Hoping the kegerator itself works well- xmas gift to my husband but when they packed all the stuff inside- the top bar that will go on top of frig punctured the inside of the door! 2 holes- gonna patch and put white tape on - if he's upset about it , it will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Great kegerator!
customer_reviews.text: This kegerator is awesome! Almost commercial. Love the fact you can do the cold chill button when you stick in a new keg. Great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase made
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I've made, it's Always nice to be able to pour ice cold beer. It's perfect for multiple pony kegs so I can keep a few beer cans in there 2. I would recommend buying another tank or a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Ludi

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the temp, plenty of room inside. I never hooked one up, but my only grief is if you need a CO2 fill you have to do an "exchange" so my brand new CO2 tank is now in the hands of other people while i received a dirty old tank in the exchange. It is alittle difficult to get the CO2 right, i just deal with the excess head.
customer_reviews.author: Space Architect

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work...received it got it set up and when I plugged it in the compressor work but not the temp comtrol...called Kegco followed their instructions nothing...returned it..also think it was refurbished...did not look like original box...bought Edgestar through Kegerator.com....perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sommo

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Operator
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying this kegerator — efficient, quiet, easy to clean, and looks like stainless steel taps can be installed later
customer_reviews.author: Josh Geary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kegerator
customer_reviews.text: This kegerator is a game changer I absolutely love it! It wasn't cheap but I believe it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Curry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m truly enjoying my kegco... it comes with everything you need to just connect your domestic beer kegs... cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors under my patio
customer_reviews.text: It’s mobile, easy to use, easy to get the kegs in and out of and the fact that it has a booster cooler to get the kegs cooler quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat is not working. I can turn the deep freeze on only. Can’t find any replacement part on line
customer_reviews.author: Joel huey

customer_reviews.title: Great Kegerator .. Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: After researching kegerators I chose this one. It has lived up to my expectations. Holds a variety of keg sizes. The deep chill mode cooled the kegs down very quickly. I would strongly recommend this kegerator. I ordered on Wednesday and received it Friday with free Amazon Prime shipping !
customer_reviews.author: Cybrdave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome KEGERATOR
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this new addition to my mancave. Don't know why I waited so long to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Collins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kegerator
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cold beer. Easy to assemble and set up. Worth the price and wait
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Set up the unit right out of the box and it doesn’t work. Doesn’t even get cold at all. Trying to figure out how to get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Kramer

customer_reviews.title: and so far it's great! He set it up without issues
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an anniversary present for my husband, and so far it's great! He set it up without issues, and I'm happy I got a system with 2 taps because it's fun to have options! Everyone who comes over to our house thinks it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: AlliB

customer_reviews.title: Probably not an item to get shipped to you.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered twice. Both times the item came dented and or damaged. We had to bring these large items back to UPS ourself. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Bertsch

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit, but slightly damaged :(
customer_reviews.text: I love it, except upon unpacking it today .... there’s a dent in the front door (see photo). No apparent damage to the shipping box. Hoping to get a replacement door and not have to rebox/return the entire unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jay IV

customer_reviews.title: We couldn’t be happier with our kegerator!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy is to install everything and how easy to clean on top. We got it for new years and it is just perfect so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husbands man cave, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Rullman

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered beat up.
customer_reviews.text: Kegerator delivered scratched and dented up. It works but unit is so badly dented that the shelves wouldn’t even go in properly. Better off buying one at store and seeing the packaging condition yourself.
customer_reviews.author: andrew  henry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product / Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several Kegerators in the past. This product is among the best, especially for the prices. Works well, quiet, and temperature control is good. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A nice unit, but it isnt tall enough to fit alot of import kegs.
customer_reviews.author: john s.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this kegerator. I keep one 1/4 keg and one 1/6 keg in it. I keep it at 32°F and it hasn’t let me down yet. Def worth the price 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Lucio Zarate

customer_reviews.title: The item works well and was easy to assemble & start up
customer_reviews.text: The item works well and was easy to assemble & start up. Since I am running Guinness through it, I would have liked to have been able to swap out one of the couplers, regulators & one of the faucets for the appropriate items. A bit of cusomization ability would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Pours really smoothly, cools quickly. Was reasonably easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey N. Hudgins

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present from my wife and I love it. Very easy to set up and pours the perfect brew. I have 2 different 1/6 barrels in mine and there's still room to store other drinks or mugs to keep cold.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Cold beer at all times probably should come with an extra liver
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for my fiancé .. works great and no more returnables hallelujah
customer_reviews.author: julie flora

customer_reviews.title: Nothing in particular!
customer_reviews.text: Like the look of the kegerator. Easy to assemble. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary R Holley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I use it for home use. Does everything it's supposed to. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Buy it BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: We have had our kegerator for a couple months now and LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Tess O.

customer_reviews.title: rectract my previous statement...
customer_reviews.text: printing a retraction here... Originally I could not get it to pour and that was operator error this product is everything it's supposed to be for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: kegerator
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good looking, easy to move because its on wheels. .Easy to assemble. Had ice cold beer within hours of receiving the kegerator.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Stagg

customer_reviews.title: FAN FREAKING TASTIC.
customer_reviews.text: New to Kegging. This was super easy intro and works well. Holds at 32 degrees without a hitch and pours great! Holds 2 quarters or 3 slims if you want to keep another one cold for backup. Great machine. Even when I expand to a custom made kegger, I'll keep this around because it's so solid!
customer_reviews.author: plainolewhitey

customer_reviews.title: ... instead of 5 because although the kegerator itself is awesome the taps are crap
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 because although the kegerator itself is awesome the taps are crap. I had it about 2 months and had to replace one of the taps that froze. I would recommend going ahead and ordering different taps when you order this product. Don't let this stop you from ordering this product though, besides the tap issue we love it.
customer_reviews.author: G3

customer_reviews.title: Small Leak In Hose
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine EXCEPT one of the lines to the keg leaks a very small amount on the connect to the keg. Would be awesome to get another hose. Tightened the bolt as much as it can and it still leaked so must be a leak in the seal.
customer_reviews.author: Tanbir M

customer_reviews.title: I also got this to work with two 1/4 barrels ...
customer_reviews.text: I also got this to work with two 1/4 barrels with a little height adjustment on one barrel and the CO2 tank and using one low profile coupler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad that I spent the extra money for the stainless steal, double tap, and digital thermometer. It would be a pain buying a lesser kegerator and having to replace pieces and parts to make it work. this is my first kegerator and I couldnt be happier. It works perfectly and is very easy to use. Don't buy the cheap ones that cost $350-$400. You will regret it. Go for the bigger better version and you wont be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Watts

customer_reviews.title: very nice kegerator. only negative things are its noisy sometimes
customer_reviews.text: very nice kegerator. only negative things are its noisy sometimes. sounds like something rattling. also been having issues with one of the taps not working. i open it and nothing comes out. no c02 beer or anything. ran sanitizer threw it a couple times and that did nothing. besides that it works well
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: COLD BEER for the bar room!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I bought this as my wife's Christmas present. She loves it. Beer flows out nicely once I had the keg and CO2 bottle installed. Set the CO2 at 8psi.
customer_reviews.author: BlueCrushSC16

customer_reviews.title: The beer is COLD!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second kegerator. Our first one was a different brand and I never was happy about the temperature. The Kegco is so cold. Beer should be cold and it won't disappoint. Setup was easy and if fits 1 qtr barrel and 1 torpedo if you choose. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Flanary

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy for the money. Fast shipping and well packaged. Easy assembly with clear instructions. Unfortunately I received my unit with 4 missing stainless steel machine screws. I called customer service and they promptly and politely sent replacement screws via Federal Express next day delivery. Great product and excellent seller with quality support! I currently have a 1/4 keg and a Sixtel dispensing two different brands of beer flawlessly. All components are of very good quality and I have no doubt this unit will provide me with many years of dependable service. I rated at 5 starts but would easily have given this item 10! Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph J. Shenyo

customer_reviews.title: ... slim 1/6 for the 2 taps to keep everyone happy!
customer_reviews.text: well constructed and designed for 2 slim 1/6 for the 2 taps to keep everyone happy!
customer_reviews.author: redright88

customer_reviews.title: not pleased
customer_reviews.text: the parts on the kegerator broke after the second keg of beer was purchased. We have to get another compressor. It looks nice on the outside and good delivery service.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Rushton

customer_reviews.title: At this time I am still waiting to hear back ...
customer_reviews.text: At this time I am still waiting to hear back from the guys I bought this from in order to get a leaky regulator replaced. If I am able to get a new regulator and it works this Kegco Kegerator will be getting a few more stars from me
customer_reviews.author: David Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it from a frustrated customer
customer_reviews.text: It's been frustrating getting it to work. We've called Kegco/Beverage Factory multiple times and received little help. Now I have to send a confirmation of the purchase order and pictures to get replacement parts for a brand new kegerator. I don't recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the kegerator itself is great. My bad experience is this
customer_reviews.text: the kegerator itself is great. My bad experience is this: I bought it around noon on 10/12 for $779. when I looked at the item again around 5pm on 10/12 it was listed at $669. I asked Amazon for a price match and they refused. as a very loyal prime customer that spends large amounts of personal and business account $ with Amazon I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

product_meta.title: Kegco K309SS-124" Wide Homebrew Single Tap Stainless Steel Digital Kegerator
product_meta.description:
Size:2 Faucet| Color:Stainless SteelThe Kegco K309SS-1 Dual Faucet Digital Draft Beer Dispenser has all the features you've come to appreciate from other high quality Kegco models, now with digital temperature controls, fan-forced cooling, and one of the widest available temperature ranges on the market! K309SS-1 Keg Dispensers still have the standard Kegco features that you love, such as a removable easy-to-clean drip tray, a chrome guardrail, easy rolling casters, and a complete direct draw dispense system for dispensing up to two D System domestic kegs at a time. Thanks to the digital temperature controls, you can now see your specific temperature setting and set it easily with the push of a button. This keg beer cooler is designed for freestanding use and has a matte black finish on the sides with an elegant stainless steel door.

Fan-Forced cooling gives it one of the coldest temperature ranges of any beer dispenser on the market today and provides even cooling throughout the unit. Temperature can be set as low as 32 degrees for ice cold beer.

The interior is spacious enough to easily hold any full size keg, including Miller kegs, Coors Kegs and rubber kegs. It can also hold up to two 5 Gallon D System kegs or up to three 5 Gallon Cornelius Ball Lock Home Brew kegs, so you can dispense more than one beer at a time.

The Deep Chill function on this beer keg refrigerator allows you to quickly cool down a warm beer keg by forcing the compressor to work continuously for 24 hours. When the desired temperature has been reached, just press Deep Chill again to return the unit to normal operation.

When you're not using this unit as a kegerator, it is easy to convert it into a regular refrigerator for extra storage. You can space the two included adjustable shelves far enough apart to hold 2-liter bottles or gallon jugs.

Easily move the Kegco K309SS-1 Keg Dispenser to wherever the party's at on it's easy-roll casters, which lock to prevent it from rolling again until you want it to.
feature_bullets: Dispense kit includes empty 5 lb. aluminum co2 tank, a dual gauge regulator, and ball lock keg coulplers
Spacious interior can be used to store three home brew kegs or could be used as a fermentation chamber or an all-refrigerator
Digital temperature display with easy to use push button controls
Dimensions: 33.25" H x 24" W x 25" D | Weight: 123.0 lbs | Draft Beer Tower: Height - 12.25" | Diameter - 3"
Electrical Requirements: 115 V/60 Hz | Running Amps: 1.7

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars127 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
